content: the new v-land scarf is my very first scarf design it was created for the design-a scarf competition that was hosted by the cal-crochet along facebook group back in 2018 i was overwhelmed by the attention it got and felt very humbled to learn that my entry had won first place the v shape of the scarf allows it to be worn as a scarf or a cowl the point makes a lovely focal point if worn to the back yet also covers the neck for added warmth and style if worn to the front please note that us terms are used supply list - 428 meters of self striping yarn - hook 5mm or one full size larger than recommended for yarn for proper draping effect - stitch markers at least 3 - yarn needle - optional beads tassel if you would like to crochet along with us on facebook the event for this cal can be found in the events section of the cal-crochet along facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/668646249929007/ ref=share i sincerely hope that you enjoy this pattern ma the atua koutou hei manaaki patrina xxx
